summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2008 HARLEY DAVIDSON SOFTAIL CUSTOM.  WHENEVER THE CONTACT RIDES HIS BIKE DURING THE DAY OR NIGHT AT VARIOUS SPEEDS, THE HEADLIGHT MOUNT IS UNSTABLE AND SHAKES.  THE FAILURE CAUSES A STROBE LIGHT EFFECT AT NIGHT.  THE DEALER AND MANUFACTURER STATED THAT THE MOUNT WAS DESIGNED IN THAT MANNER.  THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 718 AND FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 1.  UPDATED 09/29/08. *LJ  THE CONSUMER STATED HE REPLACED THE FAULTY HEADLAMPS AT HIS EXPENSE.UPDATED 09/29/08. *JB
